page.title: 11Shops in Fletchertown.
page.content: My Mam and Dad rent a shop from Mr and Mrs Armstrong.We go to the'Cash and Carry' to buy our stock on Mondays and Thursdays.These are some of the best sellers at our shop;frozen drinks,sweets,crisps,ice lollies, because the children like to buy them. Our shop used to be a Post Office and that is why it's got a wooden counter right round,wooden shelves at the back and a window for display.There is a store room at the back that leads into my auntie Eves shop. That used to be a Fish and Chip shop,but she just uses it to store things in now.We also sell,fruit,cakes,tins of food and many other things people might need. There is also a Post Office in the other food shop in Fletchertown.It moved there in 1935.Mrs. Henderson works in the Post Office and she also owes the shop.
